name: ednethome
0:
”Alexa, show the main entrance.”
”Alexa, turn on living room light.”
”Alexa, turn on siren.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Ednet.alexa smart home is a smart security solution that lets you watch over your home from anywhere. Use the skill to manage the ednet.alexa smart home cameras, sirne and smart plugs. Simply enable the Skill in the Alexa App and link the Alexa and ednet.smart home account to get started.
